name: Dinner Tonight: Potato Chip–Crust Salmon
description: Potato Chip–Crust Salmon: We bet you can't eat just one. I’m not usually one to go throwing potato chips on my food. I like my chips whole and on a plate. But I was so intrigued by the ingredients of...
recipeIngredient: A couple handfuls of potato chips, crushed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400°F. Mix the potato chips, lime zest, dill, and olive oil.
Season the salmon with salt and pepper, then coat the salmon with the mixture.
Place in the oven and bake 20 to 25 minutes.
